group_1.narration: To all magical girls, great news from the Coordinator!
To thank you all for your constant patronage, @I’ve prepared a special gift today. @What would you know, it’s front-row seats @to the fireworks show!

Since I’ve secured a location that’s beyond spacious, @all magical girls in Kamihama are welcome. @If you want to watch the fireworks with everyone, @you’re welcome at the riverbank whether @you’re part of the Union or not~
I wish everyone a year of good health and peace.

group_1.textLeft: Mitama-san said she’s reserved a spot for us @at the riverbank!

group_1.textRight: Now we can watch with everyone!
It’ll definitely be a lot of fun watching with @friends!
Got to give it to the Coordinator! @She considers everythin’!
Since everyone there will be able to see me, I don’t @have to worry about it being crowded…

group_1.textLeft: That’s true… It is a rare opportunity, so I guess @we can take her up on her word.

group_1.textCenter: I feel like I’ve laid down enough tarps for a @lifetime...
My my, the sounds of the festival are coming @from everywhere.
I wonder if the area by the business district is @about to start up soon.
it’ll be wonderful if everyone is able to @uneventfully enjoy themselves~

group_1.textRight: Master, how are this year’s fireworks coming along,
particularly the large one launched at the very end?

group_1.textLeft: My best craftsmanship in the past ten years…
It’s even surpassed last year’s, which was said @to be a record-high.

group_1.textRight: Well then, we still have the interview. @It’s about time we head to the launch site.

group_1.textLeft: J-Just thinking about that m-makes me n-nervous...
